document_data.name: Uthgardtheim
document_data.mainbody: '''Uthgardtheim''' was the [[divine realm]] of [[Uthgar]]. It was located on the [[Ysgard (layer)|first layer]] of [[Ysgard]] according to the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], and in [[Warrior's Rest]] according to the [[World Tree cosmology]].
document_data.Description: The realm was cold, but not inhospitable. The climate was similar to [[the North]] during winter.
document_data.Cosmography: According to the World Tree cosmology, the realm of Uthgardtheim was located in the colder reaches of Warrior's Rest.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[petitioner]]s of Uthgardtheim enjoyed hunting and feasting in Uthgar's halls. The god himself shared the realm's pleasures with his fellow [[warrior]]s.
